## The investigators

*Rick Gilmore* is Professor of Psychology at Penn State. He directs the lab.

*Andrea Seisler* is the lab manager. She also serves as the Authorizations and Support Specialist for [Databrary](https://databrary.org). Andrea compiled much of the information in the first version of this protocol document.
